description: Our product has been developed by the forces and means of leading since 2007. in Ukraine service companies merchandising Lex Marketing which owns the copyright to this IT product. Storcheck Online was developed on the basis of both my own experience and includes the best practices of Western companies that have been obtained through many years of work with numerous multinational companies being clients of Lex Marketing who are now successfully using our software as in Ukraine and beyond. Storcheck Online includes the most advanced technologies for collecting, processing and display information. Reports that allows the system to build will satisfy the wishes of the most advanced Retail marketer not only Ukrainian but also Western.
